mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board ( user_seq, title, content, create_dt, importance, board_yn, file_board_yn) VALUES ( #{user_seq}, #{title}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIME(), #{importance}, #{board_yn}, #{file_board_yn} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY nb.importance, nb.create_dt DESC) AS rownum, nb.*, users.nickname FROM notice_board AS nb INNER JOIN users users ON users.seq = nb.user_seq WHERE nb.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY nb.importance, nb.create_dt DESC
SELECT nb.*, users.nickname FROM notice_board AS nb INNER JOIN users AS users ON users.seq = nb.user_seq WHERE nb.seq = #{seq}
